item.title: My very first post
item.description:
I remember when I was kid , when I was at most 15 years old, I created a weblog for myself. I was so hyped over it, I was thinking, I’m going to get so many viewers…

And I didn’t. üêè

Past-me would condemn me for not achieving that, but Present-me doesn’t even care, really, not in the slightest.

It is really weird how people change over the course of time, people can change so much, that they can become the opposite of what they once were.

item.title: About
item.description:
Hello, This is Yolowex.

My friends call me by many names, but my online friends, mostly call me Yolowex.

This is my first self-hosted blog, I am really excited, what am I going to write in it?

If you want to know about me, I am a guy in his mid-twentieth, who codes to make a living (obviously), and is heavily unattracted to many things, SPECIALLY, forex trading and crypto investing (uncapitalized on purpose).
